title: Banner Fonts.
content:
I need help identifying the two fonts on this banner. The one their names are in and the ones on the bottom of the banner -- "Big 10 Champion" font.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824200356/http:/typophile.com/files/type_84.jpg) | 268.67 KB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content:
Champion names: [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824200356/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/futura) Extra Bold Oblique manually outlined should do the job  
"BIG 10 CHAMPION": could be [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824200356/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic) Condensed Bold (#20)
